biotools.summary: EvoDesign web server is an evolutionary profile based approach to de novo protein design. Starting from a scaffold of target protein structure, EvoDesign first identifies protein families which have similar fold from the PDB library by TM-align.

bioschemas.name: EvoDesign
bioschemas.summary: EvoDesign web server is an evolutionary profile based approach to de novo protein design. Starting from a scaffold of target protein structure, EvoDesign first identifies protein families which have similar fold from the PDB library by TM-align.
